name: Composite Legendary Investor
description: Weighted blend of four legendary investor strategies: Buffett's quality moat focus (30%), Graham's deep value discipline (25%), Lynch's GARP approach (25%), and Fisher's quality growth criteria (20%)
philosophy: Combines the best of four legendary investors: Buffett's moat focus, Graham's margin of safety, Lynch's growth at reasonable price, and Fisher's quality management.
